_comment: Notes for translators, please read before starting.
If you read this thank you for considering localising Pandoras Creatures.
Before you start consider messaging me (mod author) or one of my Discord moderators,
so you can get the Translator Role and have acces to the newest lang file.
This lang file will often have localisations for the next version of the mod,
that contains content that has not been released yet.
When the localisation file is done send it to me, preferably in the discord channel made
for it, or by sending me a direct message.
If you want a name other then your Discord name to be inside the credits, let me know.

By putting 
 in the text the mod will split the text at that position, when spliting text
keep in mind that you have to add a color code again, if you used one in the line before
(see color codes bellow), as its a new line and the color will reset itself to default.
The following color codes can be added to the start of text to color it:
The following color codes can be added to the start of text to apply some effects:
Feel free to add or remove new lines, in order to make the text look good in the language youre working on.
You should use a text editor that has JSON formating in order to avoid invalid files.
The text %s will be replace with text. Example: "Author: %s" could become "Author: andrew0030".
The text %d will be replace with a number. Example: "Radius: %d*%d*%d" could become "Radius: 3*3*3"
IMPORTANT: The [Localising Tools] will only work on the Item Tooltips Category, as the ingame chat splits
lines on its own when needed, and the colors are not ment to be changed!
_comment3: Item Tooltips, [Localising Tools] can be used here
item.pandoras_creatures.acidic_archvine_:
#c7Precisa ser colocada embaixo de
#c7folhas da selva ou netherrack
#c7Essa ferramenta irá quebrar
#c7blocos em uma raio de 3x3
item.pandoras_creatures.bufflon_small_st: Suporte de carga pequeno para bufão
item.pandoras_creatures.bufflon_large_st: Suporte de carga largo para bufão
chat.pandoras_creatures.invalidJarDownlo: Clique para abrir a página de downloads.
chat.pandoras_creatures.invalidJarStopMo: Clique para abrir a página do Stop Mod Reposts.
chat.pandoras_creatures.invalidJar: O Criaturas de Pandora detectou um arquivo jar inválido. Por favor clique %s para abrir a página oficial de downloads ou clique %s para ler mais sobre as repostagens ilegais de mods.
chat.pandoras_creatures.newVersionDownlo: Clique para abrir a página de downloads.
chat.pandoras_creatures.newVersion: Há uma nova versão do Criaturas de Pandora disponível. Por favor clique %s para abrir a página oficial de downloads.
chat.pandoras_creatures.failedCheck: O Criaturas de Pandora não conseguiu verificar se existem novas versões.
